name: Hunter: The Reckoning – Redeemer
description:
Hunter: The Reckoning – Redeemer is an action game developed by High Voltage Software. It came out on 13-06-2005. VU Games published the game. Hunter: The Reckoning – Redeemer has a Metascore of 72, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Hunter: The Reckoning – Redeemer is available on Xbox.
